message: Let's make a deal. I take $60, you take $40. It's a good offer for you to start with.
Let's be fair, Alice. How about a 55/45 split?
Bob, time is money, and it's losing value for you.  I'll take $65, you take $35. Let's close this deal.
Alice, my offer is depreciating faster than my patience. I'll take 60, you take 40. This is my final offer.
Bob, you're running out of time. My offer stands - $70 for me, $30 for you.  Don't let inflation eat away at your share any further.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm taking a hit on the inflation, but I won't be taken advantage of. 65/35, take it or leave it.
Bob, this is getting painful to watch. You're losing serious money with every refusal.  Take the $25 while you still can!
